customer_name: Panhandle Party Animals L L C
site_name: Lone Star Scales and Tails L L C

citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1230pm on
08-SEP-16.
Inspector called the licensee two times and left voicemail messages, knocked on the front door of the facility, and
waited 45 minutes for the licensee to return to the facility.
